fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - **Arterial Strike**: Kills target in [Defense stage]# nights, unless Invincible. (None - 0/immediate, Basic - 1/next day, so on...). 2 day cooldown.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You have a 40% chance to cheat death. This will lower your defense by 1. Once you have *None* defense, you cannot cheat death anymore.
